mapper.select: SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 rownumber, notice_write_seq, notice_write_title, notice_write_content, notice_write_initdate, notice_write_updatedate FROM notice_write WHERE (@rownum := 0) = 0 and notice_write_deletedate is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_write (admin_id, notice_write_title, notice_write_content, notice_write_initdate) VALUES (#{admin_id},#{notice_write_title},#{notice_write_content},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_write set notice_write_title = #{notice_write_title}, notice_write_content = #{notice_write_content}, notice_write_updatedate = now() WHERE notice_write_seq = #{notice_write_seq}
UPDATE notice_write set notice_write_deletedate = now() where notice_write_seq = #{notice_write_seq}
